## Container.getMetadataMap() method

Get metadata map for the specified target and key.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getMetadataMap(metadataKey: string | symbol, target: Function | object, propertyKey?: string | symbol): any;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

metadataKey


</td><td>

string \| symbol


</td><td>

The key of metadata


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

target


</td><td>

Function \| object


</td><td>

The target class or object


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

propertyKey


</td><td>

string \| symbol


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional property key


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

any

Map instance containing metadata

## Example


```ts
const metadataMap = container.getMetadataMap('key', UserService);
const metadataMap = container.getMetadataMap('key', UserService, 'method');
```
